beachcomber.name: Beachcomber
beachcomber.description: A peaceful Autobot geologist who avoids conflict whenever possible

ravage.name: Ravage
ravage.description: Soundwave's jaguar cassette. An expert at stealth and spying, but vulnerable in a direct fight

laserbeak.name: Laserbeak
laserbeak.description: Soundwave's condor cassette. A highly effective spy and assassin, but physically fragile

ratbat.name: Ratbat
ratbat.description: A Decepticon cassette who often serves as a fuel auditor; a bureaucrat more than a warrior

buzzsaw.name: Buzzsaw
buzzsaw.description: A condor cassette similar to Laserbeak, primarily used for reconnaissance

eject.name: Eject
eject.description: Blaster's cassette warrior, more interested in sports than fighting

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.description: Blaster's cassette archivist, whose primary function is data storage, not combat

ramhorn.name: Ramhorn
ramhorn.description: Blaster's rhino cassette, strong but single-minded and easily outmaneuvered

steeljaw.name: Steeljaw
steeljaw.description: Blaster's lion cassette, a tracker but not a front-line combatant

wheelie.name: Wheelie
wheelie.description: A young Autobot survivalist who usually relies on others to fight for him

pipes.name: Pipes
pipes.description: An Autobot warrior with a distinctive pipe-laden alt mode, surprisingly tough despite his appearance

swerve.name: Swerve
swerve.description: An Autobot metallurgist and researcher, not known for his fighting prowess

tailgate.name: Tailgate
tailgate.description: An Autobot metallurgist and researcher, not known for his fighting prowess

outback.name: Outback
outback.description: An Autobot known for his low power reserves and general ineptitude in combat

kickback.name: Kickback
kickback.description: An Insecticon who is a master of manipulation but is the weakest of the original trio in a direct fight

reflector_viewfinder.name: Reflector (Viewfinder)
reflector_viewfinder.description: The leader of the Reflector trio, focused on espionage

reflector_spectro.name: Reflector (Spectro)
reflector_spectro.description: A member of the Reflector trio, focused on espionage

reflector_spyglass.name: Reflector (Spyglass)
reflector_spyglass.description: A member of the Reflector trio, focused on espionage

wideload.name: Wideload
wideload.description: An Autobot Throttlebot in charge of resource management

bluestreak.name: Bluestreak
bluestreak.description: A fast-talking Autobot gunner known for his incredible speed and marksmanship

huffer.name: Huffer
huffer.description: A pessimistic but surprisingly strong Autobot construction engineer

brawn.name: Brawn
brawn.description: A small but incredibly strong and durable Autobot commando

windcharger.name: Windcharger
windcharger.description: An Autobot with the special ability to move at super-speed for short bursts

gears.name: Gears
gears.description: A grumpy but strong and reliable Autobot scout

warpath.name: Warpath
warpath.description: An Autobot tank with a love for exclaiming "BLAM!" as he fires his powerful chest cannon

powerglide.name: Powerglide
powerglide.description: An Autobot A-10 Warthog, skilled in aerial maneuvers and strafing runs

seaspray.name: Seaspray
seaspray.description: An Autobot hovercraft, perfectly suited for naval combat scenarios

cosmos.name: Cosmos
cosmos.description: An Autobot whose unique flying saucer mode makes him ideal for space reconnaissance

red_alert.name: Red Alert
red_alert.description: The paranoid head of security for the Autobots, whose hyper-awareness makes him hard to surprise

inferno.name: Inferno
inferno.description: An Autobot firefighter who is incredibly resilient to heat and armed with a powerful extinguisher rifle

grapple.name: Grapple
grapple.description: An Autobot architect who uses his crane and building skills in creative combat ways

hoist.name: Hoist
hoist.description: The Autobot maintenance chief, whose tow-line and various repair tools double as effective weapons

tracks.name: Tracks
tracks.description: A vain Autobot warrior with a flight mode and access to a "black beam" rifle that creates total darkness

skids.name: Skids
skids.description: An Autobot theoretician with a hidden arsenal of weaponry

dirge.name: Dirge
dirge.description: A Decepticon conehead Seeker who uses his engines to generate fear-inducing frequencies

ramjet.name: Ramjet
ramjet.description: A Decepticon Seeker known for using his heavily reinforced nosecone in brutal ramming attacks

thrust.name: Thrust
thrust.description: A Decepticon Seeker with powerful vertical-lift turbines capable of creating deafening sonic booms

shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
shrapnel.description: An Insecticon who can control electricity and command swarms of his clones

bombshell.name: Bombshell
bombshell.description: An Insecticon who can fire "cerebro-shells" to control the minds of his victims

bumblebee.name: Bumblebee
bumblebee.description: A brave and resourceful scout. While small, his speed, espionage skills, and fighting spirit make him a surprisingly tough opponent

cliffjumper.name: Cliffjumper
cliffjumper.description: An Autobot warrior with a more aggressive and trigger-happy personality than Bumblebee, always eager for a fight

ratchet.name: Ratchet
ratchet.description: The Autobot's chief medical officer. While a healer by trade, his resourcefulness and knowledge of anatomy make him a surprisingly tricky combatant

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: An Autobot strategist who uses his namesake ability and magnetic disruptors to confuse and disable his enemies

trailbreaker.name: Trailbreaker
trailbreaker.description: An Autobot who can project nearly impenetrable force fields, making him an incredibly difficult defensive opponent

perceptor.name: Perceptor
perceptor.description: An Autobot super-scientist. While not a front-line brawler, his sharpshooting skills with his shoulder cannon are legendary

slag.name: Slag
slag.description: The triceratops Dinobot, known for his fiery breath and immense strength

sludge.name: Sludge
sludge.description: The apatosaurus Dinobot, whose massive size and strength allow him to create earthquakes by stomping

snarl.name: Snarl
snarl.description: The stegosaurus Dinobot, whose armored tail and solar-collecting plates make him a durable powerhouse

swoop.name: Swoop
swoop.description: The pteranodon Dinobot, a master of aerial combat armed with wing-mounted missiles

onslaught.name: Onslaught
onslaught.description: The leader of the Combaticons and a brilliant military tactician

brawl.name: Brawl
brawl.description: The tank member of the Combaticons, a brute force warrior with immense firepower

vortex.name: Vortex
vortex.description: The helicopter member of the Combaticons, who can generate powerful whirlwinds

motormaster.name: Motormaster
motormaster.description: The ruthless leader of the Stunticons, whose sheer strength and intimidating presence rival Optimus Prime's

drag_strip.name: Drag Strip
drag_strip.description: A Stunticon racer who excels at high-speed combat

scrapper.name: Scrapper
scrapper.description: The leader of the Constructicons, a skilled engineer and capable fighter

hook.name: Hook
hook.description: The perfectionist surgeon and engineer of the Constructicons

bonecrusher.name: Bonecrusher
bonecrusher.description: The demolitions expert of the Constructicons, who lives to destroy

rumble.name: Rumble
rumble.description: A cassette warrior who can create powerful earthquakes with his piledriver arms

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Rumble's twin, a cassette who can generate disorienting sonic attacks

ironhide.name: Ironhide
ironhide.description: The Autobots' grizzled weapons specialist. Incredibly tough, heavily armed, and always ready for a brawl

prowl.name: Prowl
prowl.description: A brilliant military strategist for the Autobots, whose logical mind makes him a deadly and precise opponent

jazz.name: Jazz
jazz.description: The head of Special Operations. A highly skilled, agile, and creative fighter

arcee.name: Arcee
arcee.description: A swift and deadly warrior, often depicted as one of the most skilled martial artists among the Autobots

springer.name: Springer
springer.description: An Autobot Triple Changer (car, helicopter), making him a versatile and powerful warrior on any terrain

wheeljack.name: Wheeljack
wheeljack.description: The reckless Autobot inventor. His gadgets and experimental weapons make him an unpredictable and dangerous foe

starscream.name: Starscream
starscream.description: The ambitious Decepticon Air Commander. A fast, deadly flyer armed with Null Rays

thundercracker.name: Thundercracker
thundercracker.description: An original Seeker who can create deafening sonic booms, a master of aerial combat

skywarp.name: Skywarp
skywarp.description: A Decepticon Seeker with the unique and deadly ability to teleport short distances

blaster.name: Blaster
blaster.description: The Autobot equivalent of Soundwave, a communications expert with his own team of cassettes

hot_rod.name: Hot Rod
hot_rod.description: A brash but incredibly skilled young warrior whose speed and marksmanship are top-tier

kup.name: Kup
kup.description: A veteran Autobot warrior whose centuries of experience make him a wily and resourceful fighter

sideswipe.name: Sideswipe
sideswipe.description: A flashy and daring warrior, skilled in both ranged and melee combat, often utilizing a jetpack

sunstreaker.name: Sunstreaker
sunstreaker.description: Sideswipe's vain twin brother, who is considered one of the most ruthless and skilled fighters among the Autobots

mirage.name: Mirage
mirage.description: An Autobot spy who can turn invisible, making him an exceptionally difficult opponent to track and fight

hound.name: Hound
hound.description: An Autobot scout who can create incredibly detailed and realistic holograms, a master of diversion and trickery

cyclonus.name: Cyclonus
cyclonus.description: Galvatron's loyal second-in-command. A powerful and highly skilled warrior with a strong sense of honor

scourge.name: Scourge
scourge.description: The leader of Unicron's Sweeps, a formidable tracker and hunter armed with various advanced weapons

blitzwing.name: Blitzwing
blitzwing.description: A Decepticon Triple Changer (jet, tank) with a chaotic and aggressive fighting style

astrotrain.name: Astrotrain
astrotrain.description: A Decepticon Triple Changer (train, space shuttle) who specializes in transport and large-scale assaults

optimus_prime.name: Optimus Prime
optimus_prime.description: Leader of the Autobots and wielder of the Matrix of Leadership, a peerless warrior and strategist

megatron.name: Megatron
megatron.description: The tyrannical leader of the Decepticons, whose raw power, ruthlessness, and combat skill are nearly unmatched

galvatron.name: Galvatron
galvatron.description: The upgraded form of Megatron, often far more powerful and unhinged, armed with a devastating particle cannon

rodimus_prime.name: Rodimus Prime
rodimus_prime.description: Successor to Optimus, who channels the full power of the Matrix, displaying wisdom and strength beyond his years

ultra_magnus.name: Ultra Magnus
ultra_magnus.description: The City Commander of the Autobots. Incredibly strong, durable, and a master of tactics, often armed with powerful armor

predaking.name: Predaking
predaking.description: The combined form of the Predacons. A perfect fusion of five hunters, possessing immense strength and animalistic fury with no discernible weaknesses

devastator.name: Devastator
devastator.description: The first Decepticon Combiner. A being of pure brute force and destruction, though often hindered by his conflicting personalities

superion.name: Superion
superion.description: The combined form of the Aerialbots. A master of aerial combat with incredible speed and skill

bruticus.name: Bruticus
bruticus.description: The combined form of the Combaticons. A relentless engine of war with overwhelming firepower

menasor.name: Menasor
menasor.description: The combined form of the Stunticons. An unstable but incredibly destructive force of pure rage on the battlefield

defensor.name: Defensor
defensor.description: The combined form of the Protectobots. A stalwart guardian with immense durability and a powerful force field

grimlock.name: Grimlock
grimlock.description: The powerful and rebellious leader of the Dinobots, whose tyrannosaurus form gives him terrifying strength and durability

shockwave.name: Shockwave
shockwave.description: The cold, logical Decepticon military commander. A genius scientist and a brutally efficient and powerful fighter

soundwave.name: Soundwave
soundwave.description: The master of espionage. His army of cassettes and mastery of sonic warfare make him an incredibly versatile and dangerous foe

starscream_ghost.name: Starscream (Ghost Form)
starscream_ghost.description: After his death, Starscream's spark became immortal, allowing him to possess others and rendering him impossible to destroy by physical means

jetfire.name: Jetfire
jetfire.description: Often a former Decepticon, he is a massive, heavily armed Autobot scientist and aerial combatant

sentinel_prime.name: Sentinel Prime
sentinel_prime.description: The predecessor to Optimus Prime. A powerful and experienced warrior who wields weapons like the Primax Blade and Cosmic Rust cannons

tarn.name: Tarn
tarn.description: Leader of the Decepticon Justice Division. He can talk his opponents to death with his voice and is a master of psychological and physical warfare

nova_prime.name: Nova Prime
nova_prime.description: An ancient Autobot leader who became a herald of darkness, empowered by the Dead Universe itself

bludgeon.name: Bludgeon
bludgeon.description: A Decepticon master of the Cybertronian martial art of Metallikato, wielding a deadly energy sword

unicron.name: Unicron
unicron.description: The Chaos Bringer. A multiversal being who devours entire planets. His power is absolute and god-like.

primus.name: Primus
primus.description: The Creator God. The literal spark of Cybertron, whose power rivals Unicron's.

the_fallen.name: The Fallen (Megatronus Prime)
the_fallen.description: A multiversal singularity and corrupted member of the Thirteen Primes who wields cosmic dark power.

vector_prime.name: Vector Prime
vector_prime.description: One of the Thirteen Primes. A guardian of time and space, making him untouchable and all-powerful within his domain.

metroplex.name: Metroplex
metroplex.description: A city-sized Autobot. His immense scale, firepower, and durability make him an unstoppable force of nature.

trypticon.name: Trypticon
trypticon.description: A city-sized Decepticon. A walking engine of destruction capable of leveling entire civilizations.

fortress_maximus.name: Fortress Maximus
fortress_maximus.description: The Autobot Headmaster leader, a colossal warrior rivaling the other city-bots in sheer size and power.

scorponok.name: Scorponok
scorponok.description: The Decepticon Headmaster leader, a massive fortress-bot armed with devastating weaponry.

nexus_prime.name: Nexus Prime
nexus_prime.description: The first Combiner and one of the Thirteen. He can split into five powerful individuals or unite into one, controlling the very fabric of combination.

prima.name: Prima
prima.description: The firstborn of the Primes and the original wielder of the Star Saber, a warrior of unparalleled virtue and might.

alpha_trion.name: Alpha Trion
alpha_trion.description: A member of the Thirteen Primes and keeper of the Covenant of Primus, possessing ancient wisdom and immense power.

solus_prime.name: Solus Prime
solus_prime.description: A member of the Thirteen Primes. The ultimate creator, her Forge can create any weapon imaginable, including artifacts of legendary power.

onyx_prime.name: Onyx Prime
onyx_prime.description: The first beast-form Transformer and a member of the Thirteen, capable of traversing the afterlife (the Matrix) itself.

mortilus.name: Mortilus
mortilus.description: A Cybertronian god of death from the G1 comics, a fundamental force of the universe.

the_d_void.name: The D-Void
the_d_void.description: A reality-eating entity from another dimension that consumes universes, effectively a sentient black hole.

tornedron.name: Tornedron
tornedron.description: A being of pure energy created by Unicron that can drain the life force of entire planets.

infernocus.name: Infernocus
infernocus.description: A colossal demonic Combiner comprised of multiple powerful Infernocon knights.

overlord_idw.name: Overlord (IDW)
overlord_idw.description: A 'Phase-Sixer,' a Decepticon so powerful and durable he is considered a weapon of mass destruction, virtually unkillable.

sixshot.name: Sixshot
sixshot.description: A Decepticon with six different modes of transformation, a one-robot army capable of single-handedly destroying entire squadrons.

omega_supreme.name: Omega Supreme
omega_supreme.description: The last of the Guardian Robots of Cybertron, a massive Autobot with enough firepower to engage Combiners and city-bots.
